languages.text: "Наоборот. Лучше раскаяться за мгновение до смерти, чем жить в беззаконии и сгинуть в скверне, так и не осознав свои грехи".

traits.locale_text: "Я верю, что те, кого невозможно вернуть к свету Его, и правда заслуживают смерти. Но сейчас я действительно стою на распутье".
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "On the contrary. Better to repent a moment away from death than to have lived a life of iniquity, and die corrupt, without once seeing your deeds for what they are."
languages.original_text: "Наоборот. Лучше раскаяться за мгновение до смерти, чем жить в беззаконии и сгинуть в скверне, так и не осознав свои грехи".

traits.locale_text: "On the contrary. Better to repent a moment away from death than to have lived a life of iniquity, and die corrupt, without once seeing your sins for what they are."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "On the contrary. Better to repent a moment away from death than to have lived a life of iniquity, and die corrupt, without once seeing your sins for what they are."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "On the contrary. Better to repent a moment away from death than to have lived a life of iniquity, and die corrupt, without once seeing your transgressions for what they are."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "On the contrary. Better to repent a moment away from death than to have lived a life of iniquity, and die corrupt, without once seeing your transgressions for what they are."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "On the contrary. Better to repent a moment away from death than to have lived a life of iniquity, and die corrupt, without once seeing your deeds for what they are."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "On the contrary. Better to repent a moment away from death than to have lived a life of iniquity, and die corrupt, without once seeing your deeds for what they are."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: “恰恰相反。哪怕是在临死前的一瞬间悔悟，也比混混沌沌地过一辈子，根本不曾看清过自己的罪过要好。”
languages.original_text: "On the contrary. Better to repent a moment away from death than to have lived a life of iniquity, and die corrupt, without once seeing your deeds for what they are."

traits.locale_text: “恰恰相反。哪怕是在临死前的一瞬间悔悟，也比混混沌沌地过一辈子，根本不曾看清过自己的罪过要好。”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: 「逆だ。死を前にして一瞬悔い改める方が、不道徳な人生を生き、過ちを真正面から見ず腐敗したまま死ぬより良い」
languages.original_text: "On the contrary. Better to repent a moment away from death than to have lived a life of iniquity, and die corrupt, without once seeing your deeds for what they are."

traits.locale_text: 「逆だ。死を前にして一瞬悔い改める方が、不道徳な人生を生き、過ちを真正面から見ず腐敗したまま死ぬより良い」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: «Al contrario. Es mejor arrepentirse estando a punto de morir que haber vivido una vida de inmoralidad y morir corrompido, sin llegar a ver tus actos por lo que son».
languages.original_text: "On the contrary. Better to repent a moment away from death than to have lived a life of iniquity, and die corrupt, without once seeing your deeds for what they are."

traits.locale_text: «Al contrario. Es mejor arrepentirse estando a punto de morir que haber vivido una vida de inmoralidad y morir corrompido, sin llegar a ver tus transgresiones por lo que son».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Im Gegenteil. Es ist besser, einen Augenblick vom Tod entfernt zu bereuen, als ein Leben des Frevels zu führen und korrupt sterben, ohne die eigenen Taten ein einziges Mal als das zu sehen, was sie sind."
languages.original_text: "On the contrary. Better to repent a moment away from death than to have lived a life of iniquity, and die corrupt, without once seeing your deeds for what they are."

traits.locale_text: "Im Gegenteil. Es ist besser, einen Augenblick vom Tod entfernt zu bereuen, als ein Leben des Frevels zu führen und korrupt sterben, ohne die eigenen Vergehen ein einziges Mal als das zu sehen, was sie sind."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: « Détrompez-vous. Mieux vaut se repentir aux portes de la mort que vivre dans l'iniquité et la corruption sans avoir jamais eu la possibilité de voir la vérité de ses propres actes. »
languages.original_text: "On the contrary. Better to repent a moment away from death than to have lived a life of iniquity, and die corrupt, without once seeing your deeds for what they are."

traits.locale_text: « Détrompez-vous. Mieux vaut se repentir aux portes de la mort que vivre dans l'iniquité et la corruption sans avoir jamais eu la possibilité de voir ses propres transgressions. »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Tam aksine. Ölümün bir an evvelinde tövbe etmek; günah dolu bir yaşam sürüp yozlaşmış bir şekilde, nasıl eylemlerde bulunduğunu bir kez olsun göremeden ölmekten daha iyidir."
languages.original_text: "On the contrary. Better to repent a moment away from death than to have lived a life of iniquity, and die corrupt, without once seeing your deeds for what they are."

traits.locale_text: "Tam aksine. Ölümün bir an evvelinde tövbe etmek, günah dolu bir yaşam sürüp, yozlaşmış bir şekilde, nasıl eylemlerde bulunduğunu bir kez olsun göremeden ölmekten daha iyidir."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04
